  • Method Details

    • encryptionKeyOrDie

      public static void encryptionKeyOrDie()
      Throw an IllegalStateException if the encryption key is not found.

      Some classes need the key to be present (e.g., the MailGun adapter), and some do not (e.g., the command-line env utility). This method provides a way for a class to halt if the key is not found.

      See Also:
      • Main.main(java.lang.String[])
      • MailgunNotifier()
